short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your browsing experience by optimizing web content loading and display

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Optimize your YouTube viewing experience with smart content management, faster page loading, and enhanced video playback. Features include intelligent content filtering, streamlined interface, and performance optimization for a smoother browsing experience.

优化 YouTube 观看体验，提供智能内容管理、界面简化、性能优化等功能，让视频浏览更加流畅舒适。
